name: Masakari Japanese Fusion
address: 1631 Sheepshead Bay Rd, Brooklyn, NY 11235, USA

reviews.text: Good service good food

Giving it a two star review because they skimped out on the sushi. Meaning instead of putting yellowtail in my roll they put fake crab meat.. love that. Thanks (rainbow roll photo attached below) and also as I went to grab a leaf from next to the sushi ( realized there‚Äôs black dirt, the wash was not proper and I don‚Äôt know how much more of dirt I‚Äôve eaten ‚Ä¶ dropping stars there. Hopefully we won‚Äôt get sick.
A little "overhyped" place for the food they are making. Decent sushi/rolls, but nothing special about them, definitely overpriced them for no reason.

They offered good food in the past, but not anymore.
The dragon roll was terrible, the eel was mostly missing, and it did not even have a eel flavour. It‚Äôs a shame. Time to check other restaurants in the neighbourhood.
One word Amazing food
Amazing place, everyone so kind, everything is clean, amazing food!!!!
I love this place very much.  It always pleasure be here a d enjoy the food.

The sushi was good but the server almost begged for a tip at the end. We asked for change on our cash bill and they frantically ran back to us and said ‚ÄòYou do realize the bill doesn‚Äôt include tip?‚Äô and we were like ‚Äò‚Ä¶We know‚Ä¶‚Äô. We just use the change from the cash to pay the tip. I have never been back since. And never going back.

The restaurant is located in the Sheepshead Bay section of Brooklyn.  They prepare Japanese cuisine.  Soups, salads, hot and cold appetizers, sushi, entrees, hibachi dinners, lunch specials, desserts and beverages are available.  I ordered the chicken teriyaki dinner and salmon teriyaki dinner.  Both included miso soup or salad.  The hibachi noodles were added as a side dish.  The food was very good and well-prepared.  Friendly and helpful staff.

Masakari Sushi is a place we've trusted for years, and they've never let us down! The reason we're loyal customers is simple, the sushi and the service are consistently top-notch.

You can really taste the freshness in their sushi, and it's amazing that they maintain such high quality while keeping their prices so reasonable. It‚Äôs a combination that's hard to beat! And a little tip, you absolutely have to try their green tea crepe cake. It‚Äôs a definite highlight.

For any sushi lover who wants a reliably great meal, this is the spot.
Waiter was helpful with ordering. Food was tasty

Nothing special about the rolls at all, the tuna/walnut salad was drenched in some syropy  sauce, service is not great either. No ‚Äúthank you‚Äù, nothing. Seems like the waiters do not wanna be there.
Great place, good food. Owner very friendly
Consistently good sushi. A+
Fresh ingredients, great flavor „ÄÇeverything was just right.
Our all-time favorite restaurant. The food is always fresh, the waiters are nice and the hostess is always sweet.
very delicious!!!!!

we had the most magical and memorable experience ever. everything exceeded our expectations and left us with memories we‚Äôll truly cherish. the food was absolutely delicious. a huge thank you to our amazing server james, you made the night even more special!

Masakari Sushi has been our go-to sushi restaurant for years, and for good reason! The service and food are consistently amazing, every single time. We're always impressed by the high quality of their sushi, and it's all offered at very reasonable prices. It's this unbeatable combination that keeps us coming back year after year. If you're looking for fantastic sushi and a reliable, wonderful dining experience, Masakari Sushi is the place to go.

I walked in with my service animal and didn‚Äôt receive any hostility, or was pressed about whether if he was a service animal or not which he is. They were so nice. I got seated at a  nice table, and there was absolutely no animosity towards my dog. The service is wonderful. The food is delicious. I would definitely come back here. This is my first time here and its been amazing.
Service was fantastic, quick waiters, great atmosphere, and the guy serving us was so smilie, great sake, sushi was super fresh, overall 10/10!
SUPER GOOD FOOD VERY FRESH AND GOOD SUSHI JAMES IS THE BEST

Extremely disappointed.
The sushi was not fresh at all ‚Äî it tasted off and had a strange texture. I couldn‚Äôt even finish my meal. For the price, I expected at least decent quality, but it was honestly one of the worst sushi I‚Äôve had. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place.

I love this place so much, the environment is really nice and clean as well as the waiters and staff, very sweet. This is always my go to place to go for some japanese food, especially sushi, all the food is fresh and always hits the spot. The prices are good compared other sushi places around.. I would highly recommend coming hereüòÅ

This has been my local go-to sushi spot for so many years. I had stopped going here momentarily due to food poisoning years ago but started ordering from here again. The sushi quality is not always consistent I must say, but it gets the job done. Last night I ordered sushi and sashimi platters. At 5am middle of night I woke up to horrible stomachache and diarrhea. Food poisoning all over again. It is now evident that they do not have quality control over their sushi, and this is very scary. I am out of commission again, and in such pain. I felt compelled to leave a review this time. Never again will I go here.

Edit review after reading response: I‚Äôm not sure why they claim I keep saying I got food poisoning? Literally the first and only time I commented, but since we are going there, other family members have also had food poisoning after eating your stale sushi, but I was always reluctant to speak up because this has been my spot for so so long but enough is enough. Really surprised by the defensive response, rather than a simply apology? but it makes sense now.
Great food. Nice presentation. Fast and courteous service. Definitely recommend this restaurant.
Perfect!

Masakari Sushi is hands down the best sushi spot in the neighborhood‚Äîand has been for decades. As one of the oldest and most trusted restaurants in the area, it continues to deliver unmatched quality in both food and service. The moment you walk in, you‚Äôre greeted with warm smiles and a cozy, authentic atmosphere that feels like home. The sushi is always fresh, beautifully presented, and packed with flavor. Every bite reminds me why this place has stood the test of time.

What truly sets Masakari apart is the service. The staff are incredibly attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable, always ready to make recommendations or accommodate any requests. And let‚Äôs talk about the sake‚Äîeasily the best I‚Äôve had in the past 20 years. Smooth, crisp, and perfectly chilled, it pairs wonderfully with any dish on the menu.

Masakari Sushi is more than just a restaurant‚Äîit‚Äôs a neighborhood gem and a culinary institution. Whether you‚Äôre a longtime local or a first-time visitor, this is a place you‚Äôll keep coming back to. Five stars without hesitation!
It was very delicious but took too mych time to arrive.
Always the best ‚ù§Ô∏è
This is the most awesome Japanese restaurant in here. The food is raising eyebrows, and the service is great. The fish is fresh.Totally recommend it for sushi lovers‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Great food. Great service. Fair prices
The environment is very warm, the meal is very enjoyable, the main food is very fresh, and I will bring my children back here next time
Grabbing food to go is awesome! Thanks!
Excellent location of the restaurant, good service, clean restaurant, large selection of menu, we liked everything!

Sushi is excellent quality and the menu is quite extensive and creative.

One thing I would not recommend is the greentea creme brule dessert. I love greentea flavor, so while I was skeptical of it being combined with creme brule, I wanted to try it. It was too bitter, as the top layer was burnt and didn't work with the natural bitterness of the matcha.
I recommend the greentea mile crepe cake instead
Sushi is great here. Always fresh and delicious. One of thr best in the area.
The Kobe beef gyoza was phenomenal, a must try
It is been a while since I was at Masakari Restaurant. The food, the service, the atmosphere was amazing! Very impressed! I can‚Äôt wait to come back here!!
Delicious ü§§
Sushi rolls was poor quality and not fresh. Very disappointed!

My friends and I went here for dinner and it definitely satisfied our sushi craving. The food was delicious and the drinks were good as well. The service is on point and the staff was friendly and professional. Everything met our expectations. The presentation of the sushi was beautiful and the fish was fresh. I‚Äôd definitely be back!

I don‚Äôt usually review restaurants, but this location was different. After some pondering, me and my family decided to go for a Japanese restaurant to celebrate my daughter‚Äôs birthday. We chose Masakari because the restaurant photos and reviews looked promising. Upon stepping into the restaurant, I was greeted by friendly staff and seated immediately. I was instantly impressed by how organized and clean this location looked compared to other similarly priced restaurants I have been to. The waiter was extremely friendly, recommending me unique and authentic dishes, such as the Kobe beef special roll, Sambal lobster, and the live scallops appetizer. The food came quickly despite how crowded it was, and words cannot describe how DELICIOUS everything was. The lobster was one of the best dishes I‚Äôve ever had! Me and my family were incredibly impressed by the amazing taste and presentation of the food. Everything was so fresh and well-made! From the amazing service to wonderful food, this is a location that I will definitely go to again. 10/10!

VERY crowded, but I mean the food is amazing so I see why lol. My eyes were definitely bigger than my stomach , the presentation of the food is GORGEOUS  The leftovers were nice for later also. The staff was attentive and kind, but I really wish they would've let me spin the wheel before I left, I mean who doesn't want to spin a wheel üòè and it was my first time there so it definitely would've gave me a reason to come back. Just expect to spend a decent amount of money here! (It's worth it thoughüëª)

There is a nice variety of menu items that are decently priced. The food tastes great and there is a bright, modern, and clean interior. However, the food may take a while to arrive at your table and in the summer, it seems they set the air conditioning to be quite cold.

Good Japanese food! The flavors and the love they put into this food is awesome! Had a truly awesome experience eating here. I‚Äôll Deff be back to try all the other sushi rolls! TREAT YO SELF! üî• Poetic Approved üíØ
I have been visiting this establishment for many years. The food is delicious, fresh, and almost always busy. And good prices!

Masakari is definitely my go to sushi place in Southern Brooklyn. It is very reasonably priced for the quality AND quantity of food you‚Äôre getting compared to other sushi places in the area. I love the presentations of the rolls and the raw fish literally melts in your mouth it tastes very high quality to me. My favorite things to get here is the dragon roll, shrimp tempura roll, Alaskan roll and vanilla cr√®me br√ªl√©e. Besides the sushi, a lot of the appetizers like the mushroom soup and crispy duck roll are very satisfying. My boyfriend loves the fried rice entrees and ramen soups available in this gem. Delicious, right by the canal and perfect for catching up with friends.

We used to visit this place before, but now our friend picked up a delivery for us. I ordered miso soup and spider rolls. The miso soup was okay, but the $11 spider roll was disappointing! The size was incredibly small, the rolls were practically see-through, and there was no avocado as advertised. They even included spoiled crab... When you eat it, the crab tastes like swamp, some kind of dirt, or maybe even its own waste. I was left hungry, so thanks for the awful dinner and for leaving me hungry.

P.S. I hope I don't wake up with food poisoning tomorrow.

Amazing service and fresh sushi üç£ Didn‚Äôt go here for couple of years and visited again last week and it was amazing!
Fresh seafood and tasty sushi.
Highly recommend to eat oysters shots and yellowtail jalape√±o appetiser.
Simple sushi rolls are great
Friendly staff
Will be back again soon
GREAT FOOD !!! For the past 10 years the quality of their food stayed AMAZING !!  Fast and polite service, delicious food and great atmosphere. Highly recommended.
If you live in Brooklyn, you might as well try this sushi restaurant!! Reasonable price and fresh ingredientsÔºÅÔºÅÔºÅ

Masakari is a gem in south Brooklyn.  One of my favorite spots to go for sushi. Their service is Always top notch, awesome atmosphere and vibe. Their menu is perfectly priced and their menu choices are very proper for anyone to feel comfortable and order the right meal. I‚Äôve had the best the times here every time. Love this place. A++++

The sushi is super fresh and delicious. Thank you masakari!
Great Sushi restaurant. Come here every time we visit NY. Food is phenomenal. Service could be a little more friendly.

It‚Äôs not often I leave a review, and the only thing I have to say is this: if you want to know the talent the chef‚Äôs here have, order the Creme‚Äô Mushroom Soup (Russian style which was surprising!!!) , and DEFINITELY the Unagi rolls. The staff are as well-presented as the dishes which were so good that I forgot all about photographing them.

If you are in the area, this place is a must visit for quality Japanese Fusion style food. It‚Äôs now on our ‚Äúrepeat visit‚Äù list after weeks of searching for a reliable eatery nearby.
Great service, amazing food . Super fresh and clean .
The food was delicious and plated beautifully.  The sashimi was fresh and all  appetizers were tasty.
Amazing atmosphere, super friendly staff . Great food , super fresh and tasty !

the tuna is a terrible black color, it does not taste fresh and sour.  Terrible taste and appearance, did not eat at all.  The squid is tough and the sauce tastes burnt.  I do not advise anyone and will never order more myself !!!!
Really good sushi for an amazing price. I‚Äôve been going here for years and the sushi is always really good/fresh.

One of my favorite sushi places. Been coming here for a decade now and was never disappointed. Love the great variety of sushi rolls and seared tuna dishes. Prices are reasonable and the place is nicely decoratedüôå
So delicious. I love the Crispy Duck Roll. Nice place. Will come again.
